description: Users are experiencing an issue with the 'new' Teams integration in Outlook 2016 and 2019 when attempting to schedule a new meeting. An error message appears stating, 'To schedule a Teams meeting, make sure you're signed in to Teams.' Attempts to resolve the issue have included updating the application, deleting Teams cache, and performing repairs or reinstalls of the software. This problem indicates a potential disconnect between the Teams application and Outlook, which could hinder meeting scheduling functionalities. The error not only impacts user productivity but can also disrupt organizational communication workflows.
